Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class CharacterCreator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.CharacterCreator
public class CharacterCreator extends Object
Class CharacterCreator is used to create a character card instance using factory method pattern.

    getCharacterWithNoInputAction(int characterId)

    private CharacterWithoutInput
    getCharacterWithoutInput(int characterId)
    Creates a character with the specified id that doesn't require any input from a player to be played in the turn (these characters are 2, 4, 6 and 8).

  • Constructor Details

    • CharacterCreator

      public CharacterCreator(Game game)
      Construct a CharacterCreator that is associated to the specified game
      Parameters:
      game - the game on which the CharacterCreator will create the character card

  • Method Details

    • getCharacter

      public CharacterCard getCharacter(int characterId) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Method getCharacter is the factory method which returns the character card that have the specified character id.
      Parameters:
      characterId - the character card id
      Returns:
      the character card instance of the specified id
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if it doesn't exist a character card with the specified id

    • getCharacterWithoutInput

      private CharacterWithoutInput getCharacterWithoutInput(int characterId) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a character with the specified id that doesn't require any input from a player to be played in the turn (these characters are 2, 4, 6 and 8). The method define also the effect (in base of the character id) that the created character will have.
      Parameters:
      characterId - the id of the character that will be created
      Returns:
      the created character
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the id is not valid (if it isn't 2, 4, 6 or 8)

    • getCharacterWithNoInputAction

      public Consumer<Player> getCharacterWithNoInputAction(int characterId)
      Returns the character action that is associated to a character with no input that have the specified id. This can be used both to create the character and to deserialize correctly a character.
      Parameters:
      characterId - the id of the character with no input
      Returns:
      the character action that is associated to a character with no input that have the specified id
